casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Angela Deborah LEWIS. No. 558PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 21, 2005. Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of February 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Denied. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of February 2005."
